title: WHATWG Streams Workstream-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG Streams Workstream

items.content_html:
The constructor to the ByteLengthQueuingStrategy looks to reference highWaterMark directly (as if a number type).

Where it is likely QueuingStrategyInit (or colloquial { highWaterMark }) was the intention.

https://streams.spec.whatwg.org/#blqs-class-definition

here:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ByteLengthQueuingStrategy/ByteLengthQueuingStrategy

this may be a common shorthand for all the queuing strategy pages?
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CountQueuingStrategy/CountQueuingStrategy

thanks for you time
items.title: [streams] ByteLengthQueuingStrategy constructor syntax should match guidelines
